amendment.description: To allow deployment of the ground-based midcourse defense element of the national ballistic missile defense system only after the mission-related capabilities of the system have been confirmed by operationally realistic testing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3368 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 57. Record Vote Number: 124.

action.text: Amendment SA 3368 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S6918-6928; text: CR S6918) To allow deployment of the ground-based midcourse defense element of the national ballistic missile defense system only after the mission-related capabilities of the system have been confirmed by operationally realistic testing.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3368 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 57. Record Vote Number: 124.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3368 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 57. Record Vote Number: 124.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3368 proposed by Senator Boxer.
